pageContext.claim: “Whether you call it Vote by Mail or Absentee Voting, in Florida the election system is Safe and Secure, Tried and True. Florida’s Voting system has been cleaned up (we defeated Democrats attempts at change), so in Florida I encourage all to request a Ballot & Vote by Mail! #MAGA”
pageContext.analysis: There is no reason to think that voting by mail (or absentee voting) was ever not safe, despite the president’s repeated claims.
